author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: High school update | Monday's scores and highlights
text:
Football VISAA power ratings
Division I
Team (record), rating
1. Benedictine (6-0), 15.50; 2. St. John Paul the Great (6-1), 11.29; 3. St. Christopher’s (5-2), 10.43; 4. Bishop Ireton (5-2), 10.29; 5. Flint Hill (4-2), 8.67; 6. St. Stephen’s & St. Agnes (4-3), 7.29.
Division II
1. Trinity Episcopal (5-2), 9.29; 2. Blue Ridge (4-1), 8.00; 3. St. Anne’s-Belfield (4-2), 7.50; 4. Fishburne Military (3-3), 4.17; 5. Randolph-Macon (3-3), 4.17; 6. Bishop Sullivan (2-4), 4.00.
Division III
1. Atlantic Shores (6-0), 11.00; 2. Nansemond-Suffolk (5-2), 8.43; 3. North Cross (4-2), 6.33; 4. The Covenant (4-3), 5.43; 5. Virginia Episcopal (3-3), 5.17; 6. Greenbrier Christian (3-4), 4.00.
Division IV
1. Isle of Wight (7-1), 7.43; 2. Roanoke Catholic (6-1), 7.00; 3. Fuqua (4-2); 6.67; 4. Richmond Christian (5-1), 6.67; 5. Quantico (3-1), 4.75; 6. Broadwater Academy (4-4), 4.25.
Cheer
Saturday
Monitor-Merrimac championships
Team scores: 1. Grassfield 273.5; 2. Western Branch 243.5; 3. Oscar Smith 205.5; 4. Woodside 185; 5. Granby 165.
All-Conference team
Taylor Wilson (Grassfield); Kealah Jackson (Granby); Ariana Labat (OS); Megan Messex (WB); Aajah Alexander (Woodside).
Coach of the Year: Denise Knight (OS).
Field hockey
#6 Nansemond River 4, Warwick 0
G—NR, Samuel 2, Rhiel, Mounie.
#10 Maury 2, Menchville 0
G—Maury, Hayes, Ferris; Mench., Coon.
Great Bridge 2, #9 Tallwood 1
G—GB, Tollaksen, Hyman; T, Zoigt.
Trailing 1-0 at halftime, Brooke Hyman equalized and Peyton Tollaksen scored the winner on a penalty stroke midway through the 2nd half.

(Selected by staff writer Lee Tolliver)
Team W-L-T Pvs

2. First Colonial 15-1-0 2

South Hampton Roads records
Coastal Conference: Bayside 0-9; Cox 13-1; First Colonial 15-1; Kellam 9-3; Landstown 2-7; Ocean Lakes 7-6; Tallwood 9-4.
Monitor-Merrimac Conference: Granby 4-3; Grassfield 13-2; Oscar Smith 0-9; Western Branch 5-7.
Atlantic Conference: Green Run 0-12; Hickory 12-2; Indian River 4-8; Kempsville 2-8; Maury 6-3; Norview 4-5; Princess Anne 8-4; Salem 5-10.
PenSouth Conference: Nansemond River 10-2.
Conference 17: Churchland 0-5; Deep Creek 2-8; Great Bridge 11-3; King’s Fork 0-9; Lake Taylor 0-0. (Wilson does not play field hockey).
Conference 27: Booker T. Washington 0-0; Lakeland 10-3; (Norcom does not play field hockey).
Tidewater Conference: Bishop Sullivan 10-6, 3-0; Norfolk Academy 9-3, 3-0; Cape Henry 5-5, 2-1; Nansemond-Suffolk 8-4-1, 1-1; Walsingham 2-10-1, 1-2; Norfolk Collegiate 3-7-2, 0-4; Hampton Roads 1-5, 0-2.

Riordan-Luter, 8-1.
Norfolk Academy 9, Norfolk Christian 0

(25-13, 25-2, 25-9)

#10 Landstown d. Grassfield, 3-1
(26-24, 23-25, 25-23, 25-21)
Tripp McGuire had 12 kills.
